page.title: 07Farming Fruit Apples Pears
page.content: We went to a fruit farm. The farmer's main crop is apples, but he has other crops such as pears, wheat and barley. He also grows peony flowers for the seeds. The farm is about l00 acres and is mainly in one block. The farmer who runs this farm is the owner. He lives in the farmhouse, which is approximately 250 years old. He has ten helpers but at picking time there are as many as 50 pickers. Between the trees in the orchard there are many bee hives for pollination. New trees come from nurseries in England but some come from Holland and Belgium. When the apples are picked they are graded, packed and sent to all parts of the United Kingdom via Chelmsford.
